Class Activity3

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Activity3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Activity3
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is the third activity of our game, in which the user is able to drag boxes into the bin equal to the answer of a math equation. They can remove boxes by pressing remove, and check their number by pressing done. Every equation they answer correctly (when they press done) awards them with one point, which can be awarded to them for the duration of the time limit. The user can also pause while doing this activity, and can return to the main screen if they wish, or resume.

    Version 1 (4 Hours): All Methods were created in this for the mouse ware and equations. Done by Aashmika.

    Version 2 (2 Hour): Methods were modified with implementations of all three levels.Done by Aashmika.

    Version 3 (1.5 Hours): Implementing the pause option. Done by Tiffany.

    Version:
    1 05.28.16, 2 05.29.16, 3 05.09.31 Program name: Activity3.java
    Author:
    Aashmika Mali Modified by Tiffany
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Activity3

        public Activity3()
        This no paramater constructor of the Activity3 class deals mainly with the mouse ware for the class. This means that it has abstract methods for MouseListener, such as mouseMoved, released, dragged and clicked. Using these methods, we are able to draw the boxes in different places based on the user's mouse commands. The constructor also makes it possible to pause the game using keyboard shortcuts.

        Local variables:

        layout Of type SpringLayout, it is used when putting constraints on graphical objects.

        c Of type Countdown, it creates a new countdown for the activity.

        h Of type Hedgehog, it creates a new Hedgehog for the activity.

        b Of type Box, it creates a new Box for the activity.

        temp1 It saves the temporary mouse click x coordinate.

        temp2 It saves the temporary mouse click y coordinate.

        p Of type pause, it is used to activate the pause class.

        pause This points to the Action class.

        Parameters:

        e - This points to the ActionEvent class.

        e - This points to the MouseEvent class.

        Exceptions:

        PrinterException ex It is the caught exception when calling the print method.

    • Method Detail

      • setNums

        public void setNums()
        This method sets the numbers used in the equation for the current truckload. It uses if statements to check which level the game is at.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This is the paint method for the class. It deals with drawing the boxes, background, equation and other screen graohics. It uses a MediaTracker for the background, and autoReplenishes the background when all the boxes have been dragged into the truck.

        Local variables:

        tracker Of type MediaTracker, it is used when drawing the background.

        background Of type Image, it is used to draw on the frame.

        x An int used in for loops as an incrementing variable.

        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
